jobs.title: Freelance Photographer
jobs.overview: Join our network of professional photographers specializing in real estate and property marketing. Work on exciting projects creating stunning visuals that help properties sell faster and for better prices.
responsibilities: Capture high-quality interior and exterior property photographs
Ensure proper lighting, composition, and staging for each shot
Deliver professionally edited images within agreed timelines
Coordinate with property owners and real estate agents
Maintain consistent quality standards across all projects
Provide creative input on optimal shooting angles and techniques
Handle post-processing and color correction
Manage equipment and ensure backup systems are in place
requirements: Minimum 2 years experience in real estate or architectural photography
Professional camera equipment (DSLR/mirrorless with wide-angle lens)
Proficiency in photo editing software (Lightroom, Photoshop)
Strong portfolio demonstrating interior and exterior photography skills
Excellent communication and time management skills
Ability to work independently and meet deadlines
Reliable transportation to property locations
Professional liability insurance preferred
benefits: Flexible schedule - work when it suits you

compensation.details: Based on property size, complexity, and additional services. Higher rates for premium properties and rush jobs.

jobs.availability: Flexible schedule with weekend availability preferred

jobs.title: Freelance Interior Designer
jobs.overview: Create stunning virtual staging and interior design solutions for real estate properties. Help potential buyers visualize the full potential of empty or outdated spaces through professional design expertise.
responsibilities: Create virtual staging designs for empty properties
Develop furniture and decor layouts for various room types
Select appropriate color schemes and design styles
Produce photorealistic renderings and visualizations
Collaborate with photographers and 3D artists
Maintain current knowledge of interior design trends
Ensure designs align with target market demographics
Provide multiple design options per project
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Interior Design or related field
3+ years experience in interior design or virtual staging
Proficiency in design software (SketchUp, AutoCAD, or similar)
Strong understanding of color theory and space planning
Portfolio showcasing residential interior design work
Knowledge of furniture and decor sourcing
Excellent visual communication skills
Ability to work with tight deadlines
benefits: Work from anywhere with internet connection
Diverse range of property types and styles

compensation.details: Varies based on room count, design complexity, and revision requirements. Premium rates for luxury properties.

jobs.availability: Flexible schedule with ability to meet project deadlines

jobs.title: Freelance 3D Artist
jobs.overview: Create photorealistic 3D renderings and visualizations for real estate properties. Transform architectural plans and concepts into compelling visual experiences that help clients envision completed projects.
responsibilities: Create photorealistic 3D renderings from architectural plans
Develop interior and exterior visualizations
Model furniture, fixtures, and architectural details
Apply appropriate materials, textures, and lighting
Produce high-quality final renders for marketing use
Collaborate with architects, designers, and photographers
Iterate on designs based on client feedback
Maintain organized project files and asset libraries
requirements: 3+ years experience in 3D architectural visualization
Proficiency in 3D software (3ds Max, Blender, Cinema 4D, or similar)
Strong understanding of lighting and rendering techniques
Experience with V-Ray, Corona, or similar rendering engines
Portfolio demonstrating photorealistic architectural renders
Knowledge of architectural principles and construction
Excellent attention to detail and quality standards
Ability to interpret 2D plans and create 3D models
benefits: Opportunity to work with top-tier properties
Access to latest software and techniques

compensation.details: Based on render complexity, number of views, and timeline requirements. Premium rates for luxury developments and animations.

jobs.availability: Flexible schedule with ability to handle multiple projects

jobs.title: Freelance Videographer
jobs.overview: Create compelling video content for real estate marketing including property tours, drone footage, and promotional videos. Help properties stand out in the market with professional video production services.
responsibilities: Film professional property walkthrough videos
Capture aerial footage using drone equipment
Edit and produce final video content
Create social media optimized video formats
Coordinate filming schedules with property owners
Ensure proper lighting and audio quality
Deliver videos in required formats and specifications
Maintain and operate video equipment safely
requirements: 2+ years experience in real estate or commercial videography
Professional video equipment (4K camera, stabilizers, etc.)
Drone pilot certification (Part 107 or equivalent)
Proficiency in video editing software (Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
Strong portfolio of property and architectural videos
Knowledge of video compression and delivery formats
Excellent storytelling and visual composition skills
Reliable transportation and equipment insurance
benefits: Opportunity to work with unique properties

compensation.details: Based on video length, complexity, drone requirements, and editing needs. Premium rates for luxury properties and rush deliveries.

jobs.availability: Flexible schedule with weekend availability for optimal lighting
